Prevention & Control of anaemia: Intake of adequate and balanced nutrition will cover all the required nutrients 
to prevent nutritional anaemia.
Sources of dietary iron: Iron from food comes in two forms: heme and non-heme. Heme is found only in animal 
flesh like meat, eggs and fish etc. Non-heme iron is found in plant foods like whole grains, nuts, seeds, legumes, 
and leafy greens
